document.full_text: lebron james scored 43 points, including 23 in a dominant third quarter, and the miami heat beat the atlanta hawks 106-85 on friday night.
document.title: lebron james scores 43 as heat blow out hawks
lines_and_colors: lebron james scored 43 points, including 23 in a dominant third quarter, and the miami heat beat the atlanta hawks 106-85 on friday night.
